name: Robots! Attack!
description:
Attack The Robots Please. This is still in beta I guess. Idk if I'll add a story or even update this again.

Instructions For Install

1. Install the zip (Windows only)

2. Extract the zip into a appropriate folder

3. Start Robots! Attack!.exe

Side note: Windows Might think the file is a virus when its not. So click more info then run.

4. Set up the game then click play

Thanks for playing

Created By theholykingmax
